Class for use https://markerapi.com/


=======
Install
=======

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install trademac-trademark

=======
Example
=======

.. code-block:: python

  from trademark.marker import API

  params = {
    'username': 'username',
    'password': 'password',
    'search': 'search'
  }

  marker = API(params)

  print marker.result()
